description:
With their own graduation approaching, Kurumi and Ayako think back to when their seniors graduated from the tennis club. Will their memories send them spiraling into depression or inspire them to play better at the upcoming tournament?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kouhai to Ki Naru Tefutefu Hitotsu Mishi
To Gaze Upon an Aureolin Butterfly Alongside Kouhai
後輩と 黄なるてふてふ 一つ見し
